name: CatAdventure
description:
Short Story: ( 2 Ending )

The adventurer (cat) traveled through a forest full of obstacles such as monsters and a difficult environment, but this adventurer had the ability to make the roots grow into full-grown trees instantly, or to cut down planted trees back to roots.

Controls:

  • WASD -> Move
  • J -> Attak or CutTree
  • P -> PlantTree
  • K -> KillSelf

Rules:

  • Has 1 jump recharge when grounded
  • Attack can destroy monster, bullets and Tree ( attack at roots )
  • Plant action work when you close enough to roots

Play now
